<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Headshot](/Feats.aspx?ID=3201) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Gunslinger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=406" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 118</row>

**Prerequisites**
[way of the sniper](/Ways.aspx?ID=3)

**Requirements**
You're wielding a loaded firearm or crossbow.

</column>

---

You attempt to finish your target with a final, well-placed shot. Make a crossbow or firearm Strike. If you've damaged the target within the last minute with the same weapon and you get a critical success on your attack roll, the target must succeed at a Fortitude save against your class DC or die; this is a [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) and [incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93) effect. A creature that survives is temporarily immune for 1 day. Creatures with no head (such as [dullahans](/Monsters.aspx?ID=171) or [oozes](/Traits.aspx?ID=122)) are immune to this ability, and creatures with redundant heads (such as [ettins](/Monsters.aspx?ID=204)) might survive the destruction of a head.

requirement: You're wielding a loaded firearm or crossbow.
